translations: 使......无法回避；面对，面临；对抗；与（某人）对峙；处理，解决（confront 的过去式和过去分词）

sentences.sentence: She was confronted with severe money problems.
sentences.translation: 她面临严重的资金问题。

sentences.sentence: This was the first time he had confronted an armed robber.
sentences.translation: 这是他第一次面对一个武装劫匪。

sentences.sentence: When we confronted him, he denied everything.
sentences.translation: 我们与他当面对质时，他什么都不承认。
